attributes.action: The vote to 'leave or stay'  in the E.U to take place NOW.
attributes.background:
51% of british people recently polled stated they wanted to leave the european union...
So why have the british people to wait another year?   Isn't it time we had a say.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105863

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
